com.crawljax.condition
Interface Condition

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCondition, CountCondition, JavaScriptCondition, NotRegexCondition, NotUrlCondition, NotVisibleCondition, NotXPathCondition, RegexCondition, UrlCondition, VisibleCondition, XPathCondition
@ThreadSafe
public interface Condition

A condition is a condition which can be tested on the current state in the browser.
